amendment.description: Amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 70, 85, 86, 87, 88, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 97, 101, 102, 103, 104, and 105 printed in House Report 112-88.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-88 offered as en bloc # 3: Nos. 70, 74, 85, 86, 87, 88, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 97, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A045) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
